entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 15 April 2023
